title: Shift
description: In a future less than fifty years away, the world is still as we know it. Time continues to tick by. The truth is that it is ticking away.A powerful few know what lies ahead.They are setting us on a path from which we can never return.A path that will lead to destruction; that will take us below ground.The history of the silo is about to be written.Our future is about to begin.
author: Hugh Howey
